description.en: "Teams in Organizations" is an intensive, interactive and experiential course focusing on various aspects of the teamwork. Even though it is a theory-based course, it applies highly practical approach to the subject matter. The course is designed to provide students with essential understanding of teamwork fundamentals to become more effective and productive team member.
description.et: "Meeskonnad organisatsioonis" on intensiivne, interaktiivne ja praktiline kursus, mille keskmeks on meeskonnatöö erinevad aspektid. Kursus põhineb küll teoreetilistel alustel, kuid teemasid käsitletakse praktilises võtmes erinevate aktiivõppe meetodite kaudu. See võimaldab tudengitel paremini teadvustada peamisi meeskonnatöö elemente, et olla tõhus ja tulemuslik meeskonna mängija.

objectives.en: To give an overview of the basic fundamentals of teamwork, both the central concepts as well as the main processes of teamwork will be covered. Practicums provide students with an opportunity to raise their practical awareness about key factors and skills essential for teamwork in order to become more effective team member.
objectives.et: Anda ülevaade peamistest meeskonna toimimise alustest, meeskonnatöö võtmekontseptsioonidest ja -protsessidest. Praktikumide kaudu tõsta tudengite praktilist teadlikkust meeskonnatöö võtmeteguritest ja -oskustes, et olla veelgi tõhusam meeskonna liige.

learning_outcomes.en: The student who has completed the course:
- understands the essence of teamwork, incl. the main concepts and processes driving effective teamwork;
learning_outcomes.et: - mõistab meeskonnatöö olemust organisatsioonis, sh peamisi meeskonnatööga seotud kontseptsioone ja protsesse;

learning_outcomes.en: - is more aware of his/ her contribution to the teamwork and analyze the team's effectiveness and performance.
learning_outcomes.et: - on võimeline teadlikumalt osalema meeskonnatöös ning analüüsima selle tõhusust ja tulemuslikkust.

notes.et:
Feedback on seminar assignments: verbal in the class
Feedback on group homework assignment: verbal during presentations
Feedback on individual homework assignment: in Moodle
Feedback on final test: points in Moodle

independent_work.et:
* Active participation in seminars
Seminars are activity based with the aim to practice teamwork.

* Group homework assignment: real teamwork problem solving based on article review with presentation.

* Individual homework assignment. The homework assignment is to analyze Your own teamwork skills. 

* Test 
Test aims to check general knowledge about the teamwork (material provided at the lectures).

More instructions will be provided in Moodle.

grade_evaluation.et:
Participation in lectures and seminars: it is necessary to participate at least in 4 lectures/seminars out of 5 meetings. 
Homework assignment in groups with presentations: non-differentiated (pass, fail)
Individual homework assignment: non-differentiated (pass, fail)
Final test: min 51% of total 100% to get positive results, otherwise re-test required

debt_elimination.et: Two time options are provided to complete final test. In case of failure it is possible to take re-test.

description.et: 2h. Introduction to the course. Group properties.  Groups vs teams. Characteristics and benefits of effective teams.
2h. Building effective teams. 101 of psychology concearning groups and teams in organisations

2h. Group development. Individuals in group. Group membership and socialization.
Roles in groups.
2h. Building effective team. Personal behaviours and social interaction.
2h. Teamworking skills part 1: setting goals, building relationships, communication skills.
2h. Teamworking skills part 2: group decision making skills, conflict resolution skills, self-managemant skills.
2h. Leadership and followership. Styles of leadership. Building effective team.
